```{r setup, include = FALSE}
# general options --------------------------------------------------------------
options(scipen = 999)
set.seed(42)
# chunk options ----------------------------------------------------------------
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache.extra = knitr::rand_seed, 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  error = FALSE, 
  echo = FALSE,
  cache = FALSE,
  eval = TRUE,
  comment = "", 
  fig.align = "center", 
  fig.retina = 3
  )
# libraries --------------------------------------------------------------------
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(fontawesome)

# theme ------------------------------------------------------------------------
library(xaringanthemer)
style_mono_light(
  base_color = "#23395b",
  code_inline_background_color ="#23395b"
  )
```
